name: Total Annihilation Kingdoms
description: This script installs Total Annihilation Kingdoms from GOG.
notes:
-You can choose your preferred interface language (English, German, Italian, French, Spanish)
-No full screen if game resolution is not the same as screen resolution (Menu and Video)
-Automatically sets renderer to software
-Set the in-game resolution in the options

files.game: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG.

input_menu.description: Please choose your preferred Interface language:

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Total Annihilation Kingdoms/Kingdoms.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please choose your preferred Interface language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - ENGLISH: English
    - GERMAN: German
    - ITALIAN: Italian
    - FRENCH: French
    - SPANISH: Spanish
    preselect: ENGLISH
- task:
    app: gdiplus
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /SUPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: $game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: RendererName
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Cavedog Entertainment\Kingdoms\RendererOptions
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Software MMX Rendering
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: RendererPrefs
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Cavedog Entertainment\Kingdoms\RendererOptions
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00010002'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: RendererType
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Cavedog Entertainment\Kingdoms\RendererOptions
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000002'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Language
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Cavedog Entertainment\Kingdoms\InterfaceOptions
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: $INPUT_LANG
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: $RESOLUTION
